subject: Football
Assaults
lead_paragraph: As the N.F.L. tries to crack down on employees who have committed assault, Aaron Kromer, a line coach, was charged with a misdemeanor assault of a boy in Florida.
snippet: As the N.F.L. tries to crack down on employees who have committed assault, Aaron Kromer, a line coach, was charged with a misdemeanor assault of a boy in Florida.
